approval_data.project_summary: This project is a simple web application to manage a list of tasks

requirements.title: User Task Creation
requirements.description: The application shall allow a user to create a new task by providing a text description. The task description field must accept a minimum of 1 character and a maximum of 255 characters.

requirements.title: Task List Display
requirements.description: The application shall display a list of all created tasks. Each task in the list shall display the task description.

requirements.title: Fast Loading Time
requirements.description: The application shall load quickly. The initial page load time should be less than 3 seconds on a standard internet connection (e.g., 10 Mbps download speed).

requirements.title: Secure Application
requirements.description: The application shall be secure. This includes protection against common web vulnerabilities such as cross-site scripting (XSS) and cross-site request forgery (CSRF).
